<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the current position of 2D control as [x, y, w, h] array. For 3D control it returns relative [x,y,z]. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''ctrlPosition''' controlName</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> controlName: [[Control]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_pos = [[ctrlPosition]] _control;</code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value>  [[ctrlCreate]], [[ctrlDelete]], [[ctrlModel]], [[ctrlSetModel]], [[ctrlSetPosition]], [[ctrlClassName]], [[displayCtrl]], [[ctrlModelScale]], [[ctrlSetModelScale]], [[ctrlModelDirAndUp]], [[ctrlSetModelDirAndUp]]  </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

<dd class="notedate">Posted on May 22, 2017 - 23:02 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Lucian|Lucian]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
If the ctrl is part of a CtrlGroup the returned position is relative to the ctrlGroups position.
</dd>

<dt class="note">[[User:Larrow|Larrow]]</dt>
<dd class="note">

</dd>
